column2: "N’ekyir no ɔdze me baa abobokɛse no ano
column3: abobokɛse no a ɔhwɛ boka afamu no a:"

column2: "na hwɛ
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn n’enyimnyam fi boka afamu bae: na ne ndze tse dɛ esu pii ne ndze: na n’enyimnyam maa asaase hyerɛnee."

column2: "Na ɔtse dɛ enyido adzehu a muhunii no no hwɛbea
column3: mekyerɛ enyido adzehu a muhunii wɔ ber a mebaa dɛ merebɛsɛɛ kurow no; na enyido adzehu no tse dɛ enyido adzehu a muhun no Kebar esutsen no ho no: na medze m’enyim butuuw famu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE n’enyimnyam nam abobokɛse a n’enyi hwɛ boka kwan do no baa fi no mu."
"Na sunsum no maa me do
column3: na ɔdze me baa fie afamu abangua no do; na hwɛ
column4: EWURADZE n’enyimnyam hyɛɛ fi no ma."

column2: "Na metsee dɛ obi fi ofi no mu rekasa kyerɛ me; na barimba bi gyina me nkyɛn."
"Na ɔsee me dɛ
column3: Onyimpa ba
column5: na m’ananadze gyinabea a mebɛtsena hɔ wɔ Israelmba mu afebɔɔ no nye yi: na Israel fifo nnkogu me dzin krɔnkrɔn no ho fi ara bio
column9: na hɔn ahemfo efun wɔ hɔn sorɔnsorɔmbea no do;"

column2: "dɛ wɔdze hɔn abowano bɛfam m’abowano
column3: na wɔdze hɔn pondua besi mo pondua ho
column4: na fasu ara na otwa menye hɔn ntamu; na wɔdze hɔn atantandze a wɔayeyɛ no egu me dzin krɔnkrɔn no ho fi: dɛm ntsi mahyew hɔn wɔ m’ebufuw mu."

column2: "Afei dze ma wonyi hɔn ndwamanyɛ
column3: na hɔn ahemfo efun

column2: "Ɔwo
column3: onyimpa ba
column4: fa fi no kyerɛ Israelfo no
column5: na hɔn enyi nto wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ ho: na ma wonsusu esusudo no."

column2: "Na sɛ hɔn enyi to dza wɔayɛ nyina ho a
column3: ma wonhu fi no no subea
column11: na kyerɛw no wɔ hɔn enyim: ama woeesie no subea nyinara na n’ahyɛdze nyinara

column2: "Ofi no ho mbra no nye yi: bepɔw no n’etsifi ne he a ɔbɔ ho aprɔw nyina ɔnyɛ akrɔnkrɔndze mu krɔnkrɔndze. Hwɛ
column3: ofi no ho mbra no nye yi."

column2: "Na afɔrmbukyia no no nsusui wɔ basafa mu nye yinom; (basafa kor yɛ basafa na nsatseama:) n’ase nyɛ bɛyɛ anamɔn kor na fa
column3: na ne tɛtɛr anamɔn kor na fa
column4: na n’anoano a ɔbɔ ho aprɔw hyia no nyɛ nsatseama kor: na iyi nyɛ afɔrmbukyia no n’ase."

column2: "Na ofi ngyinado no do dze kesi bamba kakraba no do ɔnyɛ basafa kor
column3: na ne tɛtɛr bɛyɛ anamɔn kor na fa; na ofi bamba kakraba no do dze kesi bamba kɛse no do ɔnyɛ basafa ebien
column4: na ne tɛtɛr bɛyɛ anamɔn kor na fa."

column2: "Na afɔrmbukyia sor dze no nyɛ basafa ebien; na ofi afɔrmbukyia gyakuabea dze kɔ sor no ɔnyɛ mmbɛn anan."
"Na afɔrmbukyia gyakuabea no ne tsentsen nyɛ basafa esia na ne tɛtɛr esia
column3: n’eduodoo anan no nyɛ etwaanan."

column2: "Na bamba no ne tsentsen nyɛ basafa esuon na ne tɛtɛr esuon wɔ n’eduodoo anan no do; na n’ano a otwa ho hyia no nyɛ bɛyɛ anamɔn kor; na n’ase no nyɛ anamɔn kor na fa ntwa ho nhyia; na n’atwer no nhwɛ boka afamu."
"Na ɔsee me dɛ
column3: Onyimpa ba
column4: mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Yinom nye afɔrmbukyia no ho ahyehyɛdze wɔ da a wɔbɛyɛ no
column5: dɛ wɔbɔbɔ hyew afɔr wɔ do

column2: "Asɔfo Levifo a wofi Zadok asefo mu a wɔbɛn me dɛ wɔsom no mu
column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse
column4: fa nantwifɔr kor ma hɔn ma wɔmfa mbɔ bɔn ho afɔr."

column2: "Na fa no bɔgyaa no bi
column3: na fa keka ne mmbɛn anan no
column4: na ne bamba no n’aduodoo anan no
column5: na n’anoano a ɔbɔ ho aprɔw no ho: dɛm na fa tsew ho na pata ma no."

column2: "Na fa bɔn ho afɔr nantwi no so na ɔnhyew no wɔ fi no beebi a wɔahyɛ ato hɔ wɔ krɔnkrɔnbea no ekyir."
"Na da a otsia ebien no
column3: fa apɔnkyenyin a onndzi dzɛm bra bɔbɔ bɔn ho afɔr; na wɔmfa ntsew afɔrmbukyia no ho
column4: dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze nantwisaa no tseew ho no."

column2: "Sɛ iwie ho tsew a
column3: fa nantwifɔr a onndzi dzɛm
column4: na nguankuw no mu dwanyin a onndzi dzɛm bɔbɔ afɔr."

column2: "Na fa hɔn bra EWURADZE enyim
column3: na asɔfo no mfa nkyen ngugu hɔn do
column4: na wɔmfa mbɔ hyew afɔr mma EWURADZE."

column2: "Da biara siesie apɔnkye bɔ bɔn ho afɔr araa nda esuon: wonsiesie nantwifɔr so
column3: na nguankuw mu dwanyin a onndzii dzɛm."

column2: "Nda esuon na wɔmpata mma afɔrmbukyia no na wɔntsew ho; wɔmfa no dɛm ntu nhyɛ nsa."
"Na sɛ wowie nda no dzi a
column3: ɔmbra dɛ ne da a otsia awɔtwe no
column5: asɔfo no mbɔ hom hyew afɔr na hom asomdwee afɔr no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do; na m’enyi bɔsɔ hom
